narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. The Direct Non-Compliant Item on the previous 
inspection dated July 17, 2023, had been corrected at the time of the previous inspection.  
 
This is a 2nd Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
